name: I miss you my friend
description:
I believe that dogs are beings that understand the meaning of life before we do, and that for this reason they live much shorter lives than we do.

 Lately I have been reflecting on the unconditional love that dogs have for us and how little we reciprocate our response to such a pure demonstration of affection.
 I have been missing a beloved pet very much and I reflected it in this work. 

 I miss you very much my friend .... with love Lukatorix

-Digital illustration 3000x3000 px
